CustomField.formula:
IF( TEXT(litify_pm__Status__c) = "Referred Out",
(litify_pm__Referred_Out_Date__c - litify_pm__Open_Date__c)*24*60,
IF( TEXT(litify_pm__Status__c) = "Turned Down",
(litify_pm__Turned_Down_Date__c - litify_pm__Open_Date__c)*24*60,
IF( TEXT(litify_pm__Status__c) = "Converted",
(litify_pm__Converted_Date__c - litify_pm__Open_Date__c)*24*60,
null)))
CustomField.label: Minutes to Close
